definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: cud (Ar. jir=ah;un, so called fr. sound of rumination ?)—[[גֵּרָה]] Le 11:3 + 10 t.—cud, only in legislation of clean and unclean animals, and almost always c. ([[י]]—[[ֵ]], [[ת]]—[[ַ]], [[ה]]—[[ָ]]) [[מַעֲלֵה]] Le 11:3, Le 11:4, Le 11:4, Le 11:5, Le 11:6, Le 11:26 (P) De 14:6, De 14:6, De 14:7; [[יִגׇּ֑ר]] ´[[ג]] (cf. [[גרר]] Niph.) Le 11:7, De 14:8 has [[גֵּרָת]] without vb., but read there as Le 11:7 (so Sam. LXX Di).
